items.title: A Democratic Party at War over Generational and Strategic Change
items.description: David Hogg’s controversial initiative targeting incumbents is only part of a much larger struggle.

items.title: Is Scott Pelley Going to Apologize?
items.description: The Supreme Court case on ‘LGBTQ-inclusive’ books shows how unfair he was.

items.title: Ending Disparate Impact Lawsuits Is a Victory for Equal Opportunity
items.description: Donald Trump’s executive order ends the executive branch’s role in rewriting the law and promoting discrimination in the name of equality.

items.title: Bond Markets Are Flashing Red, and Congress Must Heed the Warning
items.description: The smoke alarm is going off. Washington’s next move will determine whether it becomes a fire drill or a four-alarm blaze.

items.title: The Week: Pope Francis’s Death, and His Successor’s Challenges
items.description: Plus: Harvard files suit over an executive order cutting off its federal funding.
